title: Transforming emotions | Guided Meditation By Gurudev Sri Sri Ravi Shankar
description:
"Transforming Emotions" guided meditation by Gurudev Sri Sri Ravi Shankar, gives us the much-needed relief from negative emotions. It gives you a sense of deep relaxation and enables you to effortlessly experience a positive state of mind. Additionally, this meditation will improve your concentration.

About #Gurudev:
World-renowned humanitarian, spiritual leader, and an ambassador of peace and human values. Through his life and work, Gurudev Sri Sri Ravi Shankar has inspired millions around the world with a vision of a stress-free and violence-free world. Gurudev founded The Art of Living, a non-profit organization that is engaged in stress-management and service initiatives across the world.

Learn Sudarshan Kriya the world's most powerful breathing technique: https://aoliv.in/learnsudarshankriya

Do Like, Comment, Share & Subscribe to the channel!

#GuidedMeditation #Gurudev
channelDescription:
This is the official YouTube channel of Gurudev Sri Sri Ravi Shankar.

Gurudev is a humanitarian and spiritual leader, an ambassador of peace and human values. Through his life and work, Gurudev has inspired millions around the world with a vision of a stress-free world. He has founded courses that provide techniques and tools to live a deeper, more joyous life and he has established nonprofit organisations that recognise a common human identity above the boundaries of race, nationality, and religion.

Know more: https://gurudev.artofliving.org/
tags: guided meditation by sri sri ravi shankar

comments: Wow my new favorite guided meditation this one got me to a place where waves of low white light were flowing from the bottom of my head to the top. So comforting.🙏🏻🌸💐💮🐝  love and respects for all the teaching you have given to the world. 🌎🌞

it is profound to be told to accept negative emotions instead of dispelling them. I think this is a rare place where we are asked to accept them. makes me feel so relieved and stress free to not have to hide them or make excuses for them

Thank you Dear Guruji:  One week of doing morning and evening the meditation with you on YouTube has completely reduced all my anxiousness and worries.  I recommend this mediation to every one who feels like me.  Before you think of doing anything in your life.  Please do this mediation and see how much joy you feel.  I listen to Guruji talk in English, HInid and in Tamil.  All day for about one week has changed my life.  Thank you so much for coming in my life through YouTube.  Gita Srinivasan
jai guru dev! GURUJI's voice is so soothing,helps to keep the mind calm and stress free. Thank you guruji.
When he sings, something strike my heart and I just tears down.
